mapper.select: select a.*,b.img_url from product a left join image b on a.product_id=b.product_id and b.main_pic=1 where a.status='N' order by a.add_time desc limit #{offset},#{length}
select a.*,b.* from product a left join image b on a.product_id=b.product_id where a.product_id=#{productId}
select count(*) from product where status='N'
mapper.delete: update product set status='C' where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_type, origin_price, vip_price, product_name, total_quantity, remain, status, add_time, pp, bzfs, tl, zl, ptpz, nf, sych, nzgy, kg, gfj, dpcy, xq, jkfs, xjsj, cpcd) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sych,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nzgy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gfj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

product_id,

mapper.update:
update product
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin_price = #{originPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
vip_price = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_quantity = #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remain = #{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pp = #{pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bzfs = #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tl = #{tl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zl = #{zl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ptpz = #{ptpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nf = #{nf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sych = #{sych,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nzgy = #{nzgy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kg = #{kg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gfj = #{gfj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dpcy = #{dpcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xq = #{xq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jkfs = #{jkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xjsj = #{xjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpcd = #{cpcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_price = #{originPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, vip_price = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_quantity = #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remain = #{remain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pp = #{pp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bzfs = #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tl = #{tl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zl = #{zl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptpz = #{ptpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nf = #{nf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sych = #{sych,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nzgy = #{nzgy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kg = #{kg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gfj = #{gfj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpcy = #{dpcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xq = #{xq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jkfs = #{jkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xjsj = #{xjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpcd = #{cpcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
